name: A Story of a Band
description: Listening to contemporary hit songs can be a traumatizing experience. Protect your mental health, say no to bad music and return to the golden age of rock with A Story of a Band. 100% attitude guaranteed.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8 or 10 Processor: 1.5GHz+ Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512MB Storage: 190 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
